website_summaries.verdict: A great buy in a larger bookshelf with an industrial design.
pros: This bookshelf is praised for being easy to put together and sturdy once assembled
We love that it is adjustable for uneven floors and is lightweight despite its solid design
cons: Some owners felt that the metal was too thin, and occasionally bowed under the weight of heavier books
A few also had issues with instability on carpeting

customer_reviews.title: Good looking functional book shelf
customer_reviews.text: These are SO great. I guess I am surprised these days when things actually work,i.e. tolerances actually line up, the material is quality (you know what I 'm talking about). The Origami book shelf works! These are really neat engineering design miracles that arrive flat, fold out and buckle together in an ingenious way, and are light weight but very solid. They also come with feet that screw in which allows for adjustment on uneven floors. Highly recommended. Note: If you are giving me an unhelpful vote, please tell me why by commenting on my review so I can improve in the future. I try my best to make my reviews as helpful as possible. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Avowed Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: This is my seventh piece of Origami. Love them because I do not have to assemble, only to add on the wheels or feet. It's a little wobbly, but I really have no problem to list. As you can see, it's in my kitchen, to help with the clutter. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Moe Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great value and design. Very functional.
customer_reviews.text: While not the prettiest or most stylish shelves around (they used silver bolts instead of blackened, which would look much nicer), the Origami line are superbly functional and a great value. They set up in minutes and are very sturdy and well designed. Easy to fold up and move if need be. Prices fluctuate, so shop carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best shelf ever. I'm a single Lady and I can't build a shelf by myself. So when I saw this I had to get it. It was super easy to put together. I bought the desk too. I've had this since January and it's fabulous. It's a cluttered mess, but I added a picture.
customer_reviews.author: misswho

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clean Industrial look
customer_reviews.text: This Shelving unit is awesome! I purchased 2 of them. It takes longer to pull it out of the box than it does to assemble. It has a great clean industrial look. Now it won't sit flush against a wall because of the rear mechanism and it is extremely light so my suggestion is load the bottom shelves with your heavy books and binders and use the top for any knick knacks or lighter materials and you will be good to go. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Fast, foldable and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: After being slightly disappointed in the quality of the ORIGAMI desk, my laziness and love for the simplistic foldable furniture. So, I took another chance and ordered this Book Shelf by Origami and was not disappointed. This shelf is such an easy convenience. Unfold, lock it, and you have a fully built metal shelving unit. Awesome is an easy description. Well made, and looks great. It takes longer to take out of the box than it does to open it up! I've seen put-together furniture with the headaches of screws, nails and numerous pieces at higher prices. The Origami Shelf that unfolds in 30 seconds is a no-brainer of a better choice!
customer_reviews.author: Larkhall

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Required.  My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required. My favorite phrase in the whole world, as I am assembly challenged. Lol. Took me less than 5 minutes to "put together." And 3 of those 5 mins were spent trying to locate my scissors to cut the ties. Incredibly easy to set up, and very sturdy. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Knack

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but watch price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this. I love the shelf and it was so easy to set up BUT BEWARE. If you buy this for more than 64.00 then you are going to be ripped off. I over paid by 20.00 each, and the price dropped the next day. Amazon no longer does price adjustments apparently, so just watch for that. The shelf itself is beautiful and sturdy. Would have been 5 stars, but price hiccup knocked it down.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm use!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is using this in her dorm room. This shelf easily folds and unfolds so is perfect for transporting back and forth to college and for storing when school is out. It is light weight so is easy to carry, although the length makes it a little awkward. My daughter has completely filled all of the shelves with books, most of them large and heavy, and the shelf easily accommodates them. There is an easy to use locking mechanism to keep the shelf from folding up while in use. I couldn't be more pleased with this unit, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered one bookshelf because I wanted to make sure it would be sturdy for all the books I have. I'm placing an order for a second one tonight! The bookshelf was very easy to take out of the box it was shipped in. The shelf is already put together, so all thats required is to unlatch one latch and pull the top down and lock it in place. Again, this shelf is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Update 2/10/19: I haven't noticed any real wear and tear on this unit. No sad and sagging shelves, though I've been a little rough on the bottom ones with a ton of heavy books. Due to some roommate issues, I've actually moved four times since then and this bit of furniture has been such a relief because of how portable, collapsible, and light it is. Still happy with it. I can't lift crazy-heavy stuff and hate the prospect of having to deal with most furniture when moving, so I got this because it's lightweight, strong, and collapsible. No complaints so far! It looks decent, and it's definitely sturdy and adjustable. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Anon Ymous

customer_reviews.title: Wish all shelves had added support of second shelf
customer_reviews.text: I had to use book ends on most shelves to secure the books because of the open back on all the shelves except for the second. If all the shelves had the added support the case would still fold up and be easy to maneuver. Shelf height cannot be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy. Very good looking piece
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the coolest shelf I've gotten. I wanted an open shelf with both sides exposed. I also did not want to spend an hour putting a shelf together. I also move a lot, so any way to construct and deconstruct in the most painless way possible is ideal. This shelf literally took me 5 minutes to put together. Taking it out the box took longer than putting it together. It's very sturdy. Very good looking piece. I'm glad it's a tall shelf too. I hate buying shelves that are short. I bought two of these and will buy more if I ever need more to fill my growing book collection.
customer_reviews.author: L. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I liked my oragami desk and figured what the heck ill try the book case too, put the whole thing together in 10 seconds, not many other bookshelf that can be assembled that fast.
customer_reviews.author: Chad J Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Gr product but the most important toggle latch was damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: Gr product but the most important toggle latch was damaged and wharped so it would not reach the bolt it was to secure to....im in Hawaii,and large HEAVY PACKAGE SO IM KEEPING AND MY HUSBAND SECURED WITH HEAVYWEIGHT TAPE...A LITTLE WOBBLY BUT USABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Longley

customer_reviews.title: The book shelf is very sturdy. The cost is a little high for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The book shelf is very sturdy. The cost is a little high for the size of shelf you get but you are paying for the convenience of not having to put something together. And that aspect of the product works great! I took it out of the box, and opened it up and that was it. Once I got it out of the box it may have taken me 5 minutes. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miles T. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Best book shelf EVER! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a shelf of a dream come true. Super sturdy to store your heaviest of books. Construction of all metal. Stylish to display in your living room or study. I simply cannot emphasize enough how wonderful this shelf is. Third party seller Mighti delivered flawlessly. Tried to order this item from Amazon itself three times, without luck as for some reason they never actually shipped this item as ordered, but Mighti always comes through. Thank you Origami for creating such a fantastic shelf.
customer_reviews.author: James Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I Bought A Book Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I like this book shelf. It fits in nicely in my small studio apt. The item arrived via Amazon's 2-day Prime membership subscription. The item was easy to unpack and after a brief preview of the assembly instructions I had my book shelf standing upright in minutes. Not a very heavy object/ no need to strain it stands very erect. Overall I am very pleased with my delivery and with this book shelf. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: xiwaeo

customer_reviews.title: The, Origami.
customer_reviews.text: Hey sports fans. I've had this for many years now, and still am pleased with it. Works very well in family room, with other black furniture. Arrangement of family photos, and other items to make the room look nice. The assembly, is as easy as pulling item out of box and unfolding, then your basically done. Again, very happy with purchase. Money well spent, indeed. Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: MegaDave

customer_reviews.title: Great book shelf! No assembly, easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.text: I Love these shelves! First of all, I love that I don't have to assemble them! Amazing to just take it out of the box and be able to be placing stuff on it in minutes. I bought this because I don't have a ton of space so I needed something that had a low profile and was easy to store when not in use. This really works for me.It also looks nicer than just a regular wire shelving unit. I would buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to move around, looks cool, is lightweight. Cons: no shelf backing; shelves are narrow; shelves are not entirely level when unfolded. Likely needs bookends to hold high-end books because sides are not level. If you want to put books on this shelf, and are okay buying cheap bookends, it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: mince

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several Origami shelving and storage products, and they are consistently of the highest quality. Amazon's price point also seemed to be the best I could find. I don't believe there is a better made comparable product out there, particularly for the price. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kimmel Monologues for Teens

customer_reviews.title: Easy Storage
customer_reviews.text: They work great for storage in my small garage. They were easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: AMD Huntsville

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it, just be sure that you look at ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the engineering of this shelf system. It literally takes all of 10-15 seconds to fold it and lock it in place. zit was packed reasonably well and arrive very quickly. Its not perfectly level, but the time and frustration savings alone are worth the price of entry. I'd recommend it, just be sure that you look at the measurements and ensure this will work for you as the shelves aren't very deep.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has proven to be a really great bookshelf! There is a latch on the back, that doesn't connect to anything. It's facing a wall., so I don't mind it. The bookshelf seems sturdy, and I like the way it looks. I would recommend this product to anyone who has several books, and needs to select specific titles easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to open and close. Sturdy and good size to fit small rooms. Adjustable feet make it stable anywhere
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Easy to Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf! This is very sturdy metal and took less than 10 minutes to set up. I have it fully loaded with books and board games, and it doesn't wobble or anything. It's one of the only shelves of this height that doesn't need to be secured to the wall, which makes it really convenient. I like it so much, I'm planning to order a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: N. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: m 11 year old  grandson put it together
customer_reviews.text: bookcase is not as hefty as i hoped it would be. i bought a pair they will work well in my casual den for books routers speakers so i am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Synergy

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Assemble! Origami Makes some great products
customer_reviews.text: Origami Makes some really good easy to assemble products! This bookshelf was ready right out the box! just unfold it and snap the lock and it is ready to use! It looks nice although I plan to cover the shelves with some fabric or contact paper to soften it up.I had already bought a easy to assemble desk form Origami which is great.
customer_reviews.author: monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this up myself which is an amazing task given that I put nothing together. I was in a negative would be I would like to see it in more colors because the black that I got doesn’t go with everything
customer_reviews.author: JaimieLorai

customer_reviews.title: very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very, very easy to assemble. You take it out of the package, unfold the book shelf, put the feet on it and it's done. Takes about 5 minutes. My only complaint with the book shelf is that the shelves are bowed slightly upwards. It isn't a huge deal, but it'd be nice if the shelves were level. I have the book shelf completely loaded with books and even with that weight, the shelves are still bowed. But the desk looks nice, doesn't take up much space, and it's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Justice

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble(just screwing on the feet and sit it ...
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first. I have looked at and passed up on purchasing this product so many times. I finally decided to give it a try and I am a believer. It was easy to assemble(just screwing on the feet and sit it up where you want it). I will say it took longer to open the package (and that was fairly quick). It's sturdy, stylish, and even better easy to move. I suspect that this will stay with me for years to come. Love this product & I'm shaking my head wondering why I didn't purchase this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: They were as easy to assemble as the video showed. They are as sturdy as the details said they would be. I bought six of them and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: myron powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Durability for Small Space
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot Express the ease of setup and use. Great buy and the size was the exact width I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Washington

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: As someone that likes to be able to pack up and move easily I absolutely love the Origami furniture. I bought the bookcase along with the desk and couldn't be happier. They both fold up completely and are very easy to store and move. Only problem I've had is a latch on the desk doesn't fully click into place but that's a minor complaint
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brady

customer_reviews.title: Really like these shelves!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super product, easy setup, nice looking, level, holds a lot of books. I recommend them highly! Do not buy Winsome shelves - horrible. I'm a 72year old great grandmother with arthritis, and I had them unpacked and set up in just under five minutes. I am very happy with them and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winder

customer_reviews.title: This item is really cool and so simple to "pop" up and assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item is really cool and so simple to "pop" up and assemble. Took me a few minutes. The engineering aspect is well thought out and nifty. The only draw back is it's little wobbling, but once you insert the feet, it does the job. It was well packaged in a box, however I did notice a dented piece at the top, but it's minimal.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is very sturdy and easy to put together. It really is sincerely dummy proof, which I appreciate. I give it 4 stars simply because I haven't had this long enough, so leaving room for disappointment later on down the road. Really an excellent addition to furniture.
customer_reviews.author: BBBF

customer_reviews.title: Great portable display shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shelves! This is the third time I have bought one! I use them at sale events to display my sewn merchandise on. They hold a lot of stuff. AND they fold so darn flat! I love that I get so much display surface while taking up such minimal space in my vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: It was impossible to get the back lock to close ...
customer_reviews.text: It was impossible to get the back lock to close. It didn't even reach the hook. I don't know if they put the wrong mechanism on it but it was way too short.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love the origami bookcases!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy fold up and fold out feature. They look nice and are just what I needed. Great price too!! I am using them all over my house!!
customer_reviews.author: M. McClenagan

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It looks great and holds a lot! I'm glad others warned about putting a buffer on the back locking mechanism. It would scrape the wall if I didn't. The should really cover it is some non-marking material.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was a replacement for an inexpensive pressboard shelf that was in our son's room and it collapsed one day. This arrived quickly and was incredibly easy to put up. We may be getting another one soon because we're so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Razzy2001

customer_reviews.title: Origami Book Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shelf, and would like to order another. The problem I have is that I am unable to get the shelves to laid completely flat. Tried opening and closing again but still not flat. It is still useable but I notice it. Too lazy to return it, may move it to another room.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: All the parts that are not painted black were oxidized and rusted, straight out of the box. I would be happy with the product otherwise though.
customer_reviews.author: John Zinz

customer_reviews.title: We wanted some bookcases that would be easy to move and light
customer_reviews.text: We wanted some bookcases that would be easy to move and light. We were tired of the press board, laminate wood shelves that weigh so much. These are perfect. They hold a lot of weight, and they fold up nicely. I can see using these years for years to come for books or in a garage for other items maybe. The shelves are not deep, but they are deep enough for books and those square cloth cubes you can buy at most places.
customer_reviews.author: S Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Love Origami!
customer_reviews.text: I use this one for kitchen stuff, and it's great! I have 4 Origami's in my apartment and I love them. And, they fold up. What's better than that? They are sturdy, and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It truly is no assembly required. I bought a second one almost immediately after the first. You literally take it out of the box and pull it open from its closed position. Less than 5 minutes total!
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Best idea for shelving and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for the office. Take out of the box (not very heavy), remove one plastic strap, unfold, two snaps to lock in place and done. Goodbye IKEA type furniture you have to assemble. Super happy. Looks modern.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Now

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these a couple of years ago, and it had held up perfectly. I decided to buy another one to match. I highly recommend this bookcase. It is very easy to setup. It has a very stylish look. Very happy to have two now.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Surprisingly sturdy. My origami bookcase arrive without the plastic end caps for the tops of the metal sides to one the bookcases. I ordered two and the other one had them. I have requested they be sent to me so I can pop them in. If that's not possible, I will likely downgrade this rating. The bookcases are perfect for my garage storage.
customer_reviews.author: L Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well built, attractive shelving unit...holds a lot of my ceramic pieces that I make. $30 less on amazon than on Home shopping network where I first saw it advertised. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy W. Vokoun

customer_reviews.title: ... shelf for storage in my basement and got very happy when I saw the book case
customer_reviews.text: I have a shorter shelf for storage in my basement and got very happy when I saw the book case. My craft room supplies are getting away from me, and this is great for keeping them in one place and close at hand. Small footprint, but lots of room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: jatnj

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! My daughter loaded it with books 5 minutes after I took it out of the box....plenty sturdy. I hope Origami continues to expand its line...I will never buy furniture that needs assembly again!!
customer_reviews.author: R. GAZY

customer_reviews.title: used this at my craft show and it is perfect, very easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: used this at my craft show and it is perfect, very easy to set up and take down. Each shelf held three of my baskets so I was able to display a lot of stuff. Wish it had wheels...will check to see if I can find some.
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: EASY!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! my female neighbor & I assembled items in apx 20 minutes and I am a 78yr old woman. I will definitely buy Origami again.
customer_reviews.author: Judee Shute

customer_reviews.title: Great for college kids!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son in college because of all of the moving, at first he thought it would be to flimsy. Not the case at all, he loved it so much he asked for a second one and my youngest son wants one too. My son is a reader so each shelf is packed with books, so it can really hold the weight that it claims. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet64

customer_reviews.title: Like them so much we will be ordering 3 more in the future!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great for us as we live in an apartment. If we move, we can just fold up and easy to take. Looks good, too. Had a small dent, but nothing noticeable on the front, so didn't worry about it. My husband liked that we didn't have to assemble them!! Will be ordering at least 3 more in the near future!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee' M.

customer_reviews.title: I love origami shelves
customer_reviews.text: I love origami shelves! I have bought 5 this year. They do cost a little more, but I don't have to put it together AND when I want to move to another room or another house it is so easy to just fold it up and go.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. It was incredibly easy to set up. It took me probably five minutes to unbox it and set it up. My only complaint is that some of the shelves don't lie completely flat. I think with enough weight, they'll probably straighten out over time. I've had this set up for a few months and it seems like the shelves with more weight are flatter.
customer_reviews.author: Purrez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf and plan to buy more. Where most shelves bow under the weight of my books, this one holds up to the task and is also quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Great Quality as Expected with Origami Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed on arrival, no damage. Heavier than expected which is a good thing. Easy to access from box, and easier to assemble. Look great in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Schrammbo of SFBay

customer_reviews.title: I love the origami products
customer_reviews.text: I love the origami products. I have two of the kitchen carts, and they are great. This bookshelf is very sturdy and good quality. It is easy to open up, folds completely flat, and yet doesn't feel flimsy or temporary when it is being used. Great product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for! It fit in the area I wanted it and it holds everything great! It was very easy to get it up and set, and it looks good in my office! Good purchase! Now I wish they made even a smaller one for a real tight area in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Mlmpep

customer_reviews.title: De-clutter with style.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shelving for a small apartment. Assembled in actual minutes. Sturdy enough for books and "show" pieces.
customer_reviews.author: PattiB

customer_reviews.title: excellent book shelf and show shelf, they put away so quickly or stay where you put them even on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent book shelf and it folds up for easy packing when it is time to move them or just plain move. I have three of this and some of its cousins. They all do exactly what they are shown to do. I will be getting more of them for books and show.
customer_reviews.author: By_Rant_Or_Ruin - truth.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Farmer's Market and Craft Vendors!!! Portable, Professional, Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small business selling at a Farmer's Market. This shelf is absolutely perfect! It is light enough to be portable but sturdy enough to never tip in the booth. It has a professional appearance, not like the cheap looking plastic shelves.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: This unit is TALL sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I move a lot yet have plenty of books, I was tired of the typical wood 3-fold low shelves. This unit is TALL sturdy and attractive, out of the flat shipping box fully assembled, folds out easily, no tools. Now I can buy MORE books!
customer_reviews.author: tiina

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to set up and it holds a lot of books and looks nice. We are loving it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: So good it bought 4 more
customer_reviews.text: I am a single woman and I could move and build this in less than 5 minutes. SO EASY! Feels stable once you weigh it down -which also straightens it out. Only complaint is that it's deeper than DVDs
customer_reviews.author: woods120

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some defect..couldn't return coz m soooo bz plus its heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mata

customer_reviews.title: Almost too easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up and looks good. I’m very happy with these shelves!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great shelf. I love how this brand makes all their items easy to put together or put away. It's so convenient. And their products are great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lanamdx

customer_reviews.title: awesome bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this shelf enough put it together in matter of seconds and decorated it with nice little storage baskets, I finally feel organized!
customer_reviews.author: mema

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more, if needed
customer_reviews.text: some small dents. Not enough to send back. Overall, I love it. the only issue with all the Origami shelfs, the shelfs don't lay totally flat, at the fold but maybe with weight on them for a while, they will
customer_reviews.author: woodsie8

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT - I CAN ASSEMBLE IT BY MYSELF.
customer_reviews.text: Origami products best ever. I don't need help putting it together. GREAT - the 10-1/2 inch cubicle storage drawers (at target, walmart, etc) fit perfectly - two to a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: UPTOWN

customer_reviews.title: Origami products rock!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best bookshelves I have ever bought. strong and attractive, they hold whatever I need them to and look good while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: RNK

customer_reviews.title: Love....
customer_reviews.text: Good bookshelf. Just be careful, that when you fill it up, you don't move it or lean on it as it may sway and move from side to side. Mine holds all my textbooks, heavy books, and more. I have had it for a while and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a book shelf worth every penny easy to put up fast shipment great seller. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, sturdy shelf.

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought nine of these bad boys for trade show use and while you do have to be modestly careful that you don't tweak them while loading, storing, etc, (lest they not reopen smoothly) they're GREAT as movable, lightweight display space. A single person can open them up, "unfold" them, latch them into place and be ready to go in less than 60 seconds.

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised..quick set up.
customer_reviews.text: Was very quick to set up. It was smaller than I wad hoping for. This shelf is good for storing shoes or books. Sure beats the shelving you buy from Wal-Mart or Target. The color is attractive as well.

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black one but got a white one. I love Origami products. Will keep this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Backus

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to handle the box even if you're not that strong and set-up takes only a minute or two. I ordered one shelf and, when I received it, I immediately ordered two more to hold my (admittedly large and heavy) book collection. A plus: when one of the shelves arrived without the leveling feet, the supplier was responsive and helpful, and the replacement parts arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cappello

customer_reviews.title: When it's good...stock up!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE GREAT! Easy to assemble...and sturdy. It's a shame I can't order more. Hopefully, Amazon will stock up soon, need 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: lil' hiawatha

customer_reviews.title: Love these bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: Love these bookshelves. They are strong and hold a lot, good looking and I didn't have to put them together! There is a little bend in the middle but it does not affect the functioning and is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: maryann

product_meta.title: Origami 6-Shelf Bookcase | Open Style, Organizer Deco Rack, Large Book shelf, Tall Bookcase, Living room shelving, Freestanding, No assembly/no tools required, Modern Vertical Furniture | Black
product_meta.description:
Size:Perforated Shelving| Color:BlackOrigami Bookcase 6-Shelf RB Series The 6 Tier bookshelf is a perfect home for your books, vinyl collection, movies, antique store finds or just your general organization. The RB Series is made to be a more modern and decorative rack to go with your home in any scenario and with any organizational accessory. The rack only weighs 26 pounds but holds up to 300 pounds (50 lbs. per shelf). The rack does not include wheels but they can be attached dependent on your need. Each shelf is made of powder-coated steel and folds to an approximate skinny width of only 11 inches. Making it a perfect fit under beds, behind doors or tucked away very nicely in your garage without much space needed. The bookshelf also comes a full 1 year that s your origami rack to be perfect, and, if it is not, we will replace it for you for free. Product Specs: Size Unfolded: Approx. 24” W x 11” D x 65” H Size Folded (for Storage): Approx. 11” W x 4” D x 65” H Product Weight: Approx. 27 lbs. Weight capacity per shelf: Approx. 100 lbs. (without wheels) 600 lbs. total Included Items (1) Origami 6-Shelf Bookcase 1-year limited Origami

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Five spacious shelves will accommodate books, photos, awards and other office supplies, helping to keep your room neat and tidy. Great for place it in home office, or any other room that needs additional storage.
feature_bullets: Unfolds in under 5 seconds - 100% Pre-Assembled with no tools, assembly or significant time required
Folds flat for easy storage and portability; minimal space required to easily store in your garage, closet, under your bed or behind doors
Made of heavy duty commercial grade powder coated steel; included items: Origami 6-Shelf Bookcase (wheels are not included for this item)
Holds up to 300 pounds without wheels (60lbs/shelf)
Dimensions (Inches): Fully open: 24'' W x 11'' D x 65'' H - Completely folded: 11'' W x 4'' D x 65'' H
